title: FOR SALE:  T206 Rube Waddell Port GAI 2.5

posts.post_title: FOR SALE:  T206 Rube Waddell Port GAI 2.5
posts.post_content:
$375 shipped F&F with insurance. Pretty hot card lately. I think this would be a 2 by today’s grading standards, but I’m not making any promises to that haha

1st to comment SOLD trumps all PM’s
